data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Jeju to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jeju, South Korea
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 98,946 believers in Jeju, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Jeju, South Korea. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Jeju a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Khmer people.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Jeju, South Korea to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 98,946 believers in the state of Jeju to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, please raise up prophets in Jeju who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Jeju
location.people_groups_list: Thai, Chinese, general, Kazakh, Burmese, Vietnamese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Thai (102,000), Chinese, general (1,039,000), Kazakh (12,000), Burmese (23,000), Vietnamese (151,000)
